data.message:
Brutal with the truth

The biggest mistake of a man is trusting a woman
I usually make a lot of mistakes.
By what you've been saying of course you're not a real woman
Unfortunately, it took me a while to realize
I will not humiliate you
First it's you without noticing
That with bad words placed destroy you

Chorus
How to trust if you just make promises
I'll always remember, you can be sure.
That one day I will come back and I will charge you all the promises
Do you call yourself honest?
But I'm more than honest
Brutal with the truth
Swallow this truth

I spent years imagining something that only existed in my head.
Sincerely you have awakened the worst in me
Made me feel like crap made me for several times lose my head
This is my rematch for everything you put me through.
The bitter taste I felt in my mouth because I could not trust it anymore

Chorus
How to trust if you just make promises
I'll always remember, you can be sure.
That one day I will come back and I will charge you all the promises
Do you call yourself honest?
But I'm more than honest
Brutal with the truth
Swallow this truth

You manipulate what suits you.
And forgets the feelings involved
My feelings and I get into it because of you
No matter what i do is never enough
It's annoying to have to endure
Who has patience and can stay in his truth
If I have to be someone different

Chorus
How to trust if you just make promises
I'll always remember, you can be sure.
That one day I will come back and I will charge you all the promises
Do you call yourself honest?
But I'm more than honest
Brutal with the truth
Swallow this truth

Now it does not matter what I crave
I declare that I will win my place.
And I'm going to shine again and blind you
Because whether or not I was born for this shit.
Even if you wanna rob me, give up you're blind
Can not you see me telling you to fight back?
Do not steal my seat

Chorus
How to trust if you just make promises
I'll always remember, you can be sure.
That one day I will come back and I will charge you all the promises
Do you call yourself honest?
But I'm more than honest
Brutal with the truth
Swallow this truth

I will become the living legend you can not bring down
I know you can envy me.
Will say that I will make enemies, but I have many friends who told me to go away
Of you because you're fake and think to be true but decried with the words that comes to make me vomit

Chorus
How to trust if you just make promises
I'll always remember, you can be sure.
That one day I will come back and I will charge you all the promises
Do you call yourself honest?
But I'm more than honest
Brutal with the truth
Swallow this truth

Try to dodge my truths for fear of being unmasked, others can love you but only I know how bad it is to trust you and end up alone yes applause for you became famous for not knowing love me
My rap did not become violent I do not even want to get my hands dirty
Trying to resume
Today I stop loving your lies because they hurt me.
For years and I decided to throw truths in your face sorry I can not trust

Chorus
How to trust if you just make promises
I'll always remember, you can be sure.
That one day I will come back and I will charge you all the promises
Do you call yourself honest?
But I'm more than honest
Brutal with the truth
Swallow this truth

look Eminem if you enjoy can sing this is a lyric by me i hope you sing and make a big sucess with she big hug master
